column1: The Pit Room////    They have all the traditional meats you would expect a top notch bbq spot to have.. Ribs
column5: etc.  ny things that is great here is that
column6: let's say your get a 2 meat combo with chicken and brisket
column7: but decide to want some ribs
column8: you don't have to buy a rack. You can buy just one or two.  The next thing I loved
column9: they had a pickle bar. So many different choices of pickled veggies. I was in heaven.
